Class Triangle3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • thorwin.math.geo.Triangle3D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<Vector3D>

    public final class Triangle3D
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Vector3D>, java.io.Serializable
    Triangle in 3-dimensional space

                  double y3,
                  double z3)
        Creates a 3D triangle.
        Parameters:
        x1 - x-coordinate of point 1
        y1 - y-coordinate of point 1
        z1 - z-coordinate of point 1
        x2 - x-coordinate of point 2
        y2 - y-coordinate of point 2
        z2 - z-coordinate of point 2
        x3 - x-coordinate of point 3
        y3 - y-coordinate of point 3
        z3 - z-coordinate of point 3

    • Method Detail

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Triangle3D other)
        Calculates if this triangle intersects with another triangle.
        Parameters:
        other - the other triangle
        Returns:
        true if the triangle intersects

      • intersects

        public static boolean intersects(Vector3D v1,
                                 Vector3D v2,
                                 Vector3D v3,
                                 Vector3D u1,
                                 Vector3D u2,
                                 Vector3D u3,
                                 double epsilon)
        Checks if two triangles intersect. This intersection method uses the triangle/triangle intersection algorithm by Tomas Moller.
        Parameters:
        v1 - triangle 1, vertex 1
        v2 - triangle 1, vertex 2
        v3 - triangle 1, vertex 3
        u1 - triangle 2, vertex 1
        u2 - triangle 2, vertex 2
        u3 - triangle 2, vertex 3
        epsilon - coplanar epsilon
        Returns:
        true if the triangles intersect

      • split

        public Triangle3D[] split(Plane3D plane)
        Splits the triangle along the specified plane into three triangles
        Parameters:
        plane - plane
        Returns:
        an array of triangles (length 3, or 1 if there is no intersection)

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Plane3D plane)
        Determines if the specified plane intersects with this triangle. The intersection may be in an edge or on a vertex (in which case split() will not actually result in more triangles).
        Parameters:
        plane - plane
        Returns:
        true if there is an intersection with the specified plane.

      • plane

        public Plane3D plane()
        Returns the plane formed by the tree points of this triangle.
        Returns:
        plane

        Calculates the intersection line segment between this triangle and the plane.
        Parameters:
        plane - plane
        Returns:
        intersection line segment, if any

        Returns:

      • subdivide

        public Triangle3D[] subdivide(int iterations,
                              Transform3D transform)
        Subdivides this triangle in other triangles by dividing the triangles into 4 other triangles, in a number of iterations
        Parameters:
        iterations - Number of iterations to perform subdivision
        transform - The toAffine3D to generate to all new vertices (may be null).
        Returns:
        array of triangles (dimension is 4^iterations)
